name: Gridical
description:
Gridical is a grid based action game where the goal is to score as many points as possible by moving up. The only issue with moving up is that you can't go down. If you miss an ammo pickup, its gone forever. Healing is also a lot different than your average game.

To heal, you need to get rid of your infection first, patch up the bleeding spot, and ice the bruise. In that order, if you don't have an infection, for example, just move on to the second step. 

You get points for killing enemies although two of them can't move. So this game is actually very easy, just with more complex systems.
